references.text: Waypoints Vol 05: PPL/CPL Air Law. Chapter 3: The Pilot

questions.question: Disabled passengers must be appropriately cared for and seated in a position which facilities ______________________________.
questions.answer: Evacuation in the case of emergency.

questions.question: What must an operator ensure with regard to carrying escorted passengers?
questions.answer: They don't constitute a safety hazard to other passengers, and prior arrangement for their carriage must have been made.
